Newbie Helper:
May Einhasad's light protect you! It is my responsibility to advise new adventurers.
The power of evil is growing day by day, friend. We hear tales of unending wars, and -- most ominous of all -- even the powers of Dawn and Dusk struggle for supremacy... You will need all your strength and skill to survive in such a dangerous world. Please pay heed to my advice...
